import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import classes from './adminDashboard.module.css' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import * as actions from '../../../store/actions/index'; const AdminDashboard=(props)=> { const {onClicked,onClicked1,onClicked2,onClicked3,onViewProducts}=props useEffect(()=>{ onClicked() onClicked1() onClicked2() onClicked3() onViewProducts() },[onClicked,onClicked1,onClicked2,onClicked3,onViewProducts]) const customersHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/getCustomers") } const sellersHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/getSellers") } const AddHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/addMetadataFields") } const AddMetadataFieldHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/addMetadatFieldName") } const ViewMetadataFieldHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/viewMetadataField") } const ViewAllCategoriesHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/viewAllCategoriesForAdmin") } const AddCategoryHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/addACategory") } const AddSubCategoryHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/addASubCategory") } const updateMetadataValuesHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/updateMetadataValues") } return (

Your Account

Get Customers

Get Sellers

Add Metadata Fields

Add Metadata Field Name

View Metadata Field Name

View All Categories

Add a Root Category

Add a Sub Category

update metadata values

) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch =>{ return{ onClicked: ()=>dispatch(actions.getCategory()), onClicked1:()=>dispatch(actions.viewCategoryMetadataField()), onClicked2:()=>dispatch(actions.getAllCategoriesForAdmin()), onClicked3:()=>dispatch(actions.getCategoriesForAdd()), onViewProducts:()=>dispatch(actions.getProducts()) } } export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(AdminDashboard)
